@THE_UNDIETAKER the download pop-up window is always empty with magnet links... you can either ignore it and hit ok or go to options>preferences>UI  and get rid of it.

As for skipping files... the only way is to...
1. start download 
2. click files tab and wait for individual files to appear
3. right click on files to trash... and click on "do not download"

(this works on all versions 2.1 through current)

Note: uTorrent staff CANNOT tell you this but I CAN ver. 3.1.2 is SHIT !!!! if you don't believe me read the hundred of complaints on the uTorrent Forum... it has a nasty bug in write/cache that they can only provide bandaid/workarounds. 

If your new to uTorrent install this version "2.1.1 build 25302" u can find it at all popular archive sites such as "file hippo"

 Excellent fanboyism.

I don't understand WHY people still hate magnet links.

WAKE UP ! You don't have to download every files from a magnet link if you don't want to, you CAN select the files one by one just like before when you could dl the .torrent file.

Most of the BitTorrent clients are not yet build to support magnets, they have an awful time trying to reconstruct the file trees when you click on it (blank pop-up dialog with no files on it and you have to click OK to dl everything in a single row).

If you wait a few months, EVERY bittorrent clients will support magnets, and no one will have to suffer this blank pop up anymore. It's a fact !

BUT, if you don't want to wait around, STOP bitching about it, and USE one of the client that ALREADY support magnets. 

-> BitComet client ALWAYS load the file tree from a magnet, it's just like old times! 
It's even better when you look at it: you can select the files you want to download from a magnet, and the program also stores the magnet link for you to use it later on in order to dl the rest of the files you unchecked.

STOP CRYING AND DOWNLOAD BITCOMET, PLEASE !

Magnets are the future of torrent downloading, get this in your small minds people !
